function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increasing demand for care of COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Strain on health systems and resources, potentially leading to a shortage of care for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Expansion of healthcare facilities, allocation of additional resources, and adoption of telemedicine","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, and AI for resource allocation","People":"Healthcare workers, vulnerable populations (children, women, older persons, people living with chronic conditions, minorities, people living with disabilities)","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Deepened pre-existing inequalities in access to health services and social protection","Impact":"Worsened health outcomes for vulnerable populations, increased risk of illness and mortality","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure, social protection programs, and targeted support for vulnerable groups","Technologies":"Healthcare access platforms, data analysis for targeting support, remote monitoring for vulnerable populations","People":"Vulnerable populations (women, children, older persons, minorities, people living with disabilities)","Owner":"Government, social welfare organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Significant rise in domestic violence","Impact":"Threat to public health, increased risk of physical and mental health consequences for women and children","Mitigation":"Implementation of support services for victims, awareness campaigns, and enforcement of legal protections","Technologies":"Online support platforms, data analytics for early detection, and AI for risk assessment","People":"Women, children, survivors of domestic violence","Owner":"Law enforcement agencies, social service organizations, community leaders"}]}
